data.system_settings: Android 4.4.4 - Tablet Allview Viva H8 LTE
data.actual_result: You get just a few list with permissions that you can manage - excluding some like the read messages and see voice channels one
data.expected_result: You should see/can manage more permissions like the read messages and see voice channels one - but the permissions are missing
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server with a few people or roles where you're owner/admin - Create a category and a few channels for it - Edit the category - Go to permissions section - Select an user or a role - Observe the permissions: Some are missing, like the read messages and see voice channels one. Not all permissions available on desktop clients are available on Android too
